tasks.label: Open nextpnr logs (tail)
tasks.command:
set -e
for d in ice-build/procesadorOriginal ice-build/ADC_IC2_NEW; do
  if [ -f "$d/hardware.out" ]; then
    echo "==== $d/hardware.out (tail) ===="
    tail -n 200 "$d/hardware.out"
  fi
  if [ -f "$d/build.log" ]; then
    echo "==== $d/build.log (tail) ===="
    tail -n 200 "$d/build.log"
  fi
  if [ -f "$d/main.v" ]; then
    echo "==== $d/main.v (grep OE tri-state summary) ===="
    grep -n "SB_IO\|OUTPUT_ENABLE\|D_OUT_0\|PULLUP" "$d/main.v" | sed -n '1,200p'
  fi
 done
